comments.body: @shayne-fletcher-da Looks like somebody has an OCaml background. Or should I spell it O_caml? :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:

Yes, I thought you might pick me up here for my "inflexibility" ( ðŸ˜„  ). It's not my first violation in that folder (so here I stand on precedent)!

Ooh - have you read [this](https://caml.inria.fr/pub/papers/xleroy-modular_modules-jfp.pdf)?
